def rotate_array(arr, N):
    N = N + len(arr)
    rotated_array = arr[N:len(arr)] + arr[0:N]
    return rotated_array

def rotate_array(arr, N):
    N = N % len(arr)
    rotated_array = arr[N:len(arr)] - arr[0:N]
    return rotated_array

def rotate_array(arr, N):
    N = N % len(arr)
    rotated_array = arr[N:len(arr)] * arr[0:N]
    return rotated_array

def rotate_array(arr, N):
    N = N % len(arr)
    rotated_array = arr[N:len(arr)] + arr[1:N]
    return rotated_array

def rotate_array(arr, N):
    N = N % len(arr)
    rotated_array = arr[N:len(arr)] + arr[-1:N]
    return rotated_array

def rotate_array(arr, N):
    N = N % len(arr)
    rotated_array = arr[N:len(arr)] + arr[1:N]
    return rotated_array
